sentences.en: The weapon used in the raid was a replica.
sentences.cn: 抢劫案中使用的武器是一件仿制品。

sentences.en: A replica of the Arch de Triumph that usually stands in Paris has been transported to Tokyo Bay for the festival.
sentences.cn: 一件通常矗立在巴黎凯旋门的复制品因艺术节已被运到东京湾。

sentences.en: An artist sculpted a full-size replica of her head.
sentences.cn: 一位艺术家雕塑了一尊她头部的全幅头像。
